content: Hello im selling my own stake account for 500Eurosat 100% you get 800Euros +42 reload daysgot affiliation on it with 5 userslost 1k this month ( so monthly is going to be at least 150eu)weekly 20eur and monthly is minimum 100 eureason selling it ,gambling is no longer interresting for mepm me for Telegram or Discord

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: boudi on March 04, 2023, 06:21:28 PMHello im selling my own stake account for 500Eurosat 100% you get 800Euros +42 reload daysgot affiliation on it with 5 userslost 1k this month ( so monthly is going to be at least 150eu)weekly 20eur and monthly is minimum 100 eureason selling it ,gambling is no longer interresting for mepm me for Telegram or DiscordWhy you are not taking the bonus yourself instead of selling the account? Anyway, if you claim the account has been hacked then what will happen to the buyer (if anyone buys the account)? Also, there is another question if the site asks to verify KYC then what will be done by the buyer?
